alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 3:19PM CDT until July 16 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Franklin County in east central Missouri... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 319 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dittmer, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arnold, Festus, Pacific, Pevely, Crystal City, Herculaneum, Hillsboro, Byrnes Mill, High Ridge, Barnhart, Cedar Hill, Murphy, Antonia, Gray Summit, Oakville, Cedar Hill Lakes, House Springs, Dittmer, Horine, and Lonedell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 in Missouri near exit 257. Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 174 and 191. This also includes Mastodon Historic Site, Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site, Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site, and Robertsville State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
